structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Provisions Common To The Supreme Judicial And Superior Courts

law.catch_line: Written Order To Sheriff To Adjourn; Absence Of Justice
law.text: In such case, any justice may by a written order require the sheriff or his deputy to adjourn the court without day or to the time expressed in the order; and the officer shall adjourn the court accordingly by public proclamation in the court house.
